member.name: SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA
member.summary: An SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA structure defines a device interface in a device information set.

member.name: SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA structure. For more information, see the Remarks section.

member.name: SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA.InterfaceClassGuid
member.summary: The GUID for the class to which the device interface belongs.

summary.para: Can be one or more of the following:
The interface is the default interface for the device class.
